verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that [one] told לְיוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> Behold thy father חֹלֶ֑ה <S%H2470><s%> [is] sick וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> with him his two בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> sons עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim

וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> And [one] told לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> Behold thy son יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> cometh אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּתְחַזֵּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> strengthened יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto thee and Israel וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> himself and sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַמִּטָּֽה׃ <S%H4296><s%> upon the bed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God שַׁדַּ֛י <S%H7706><s%> Almighty נִרְאָֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me בְּל֖וּז <S%H3870><s%> unto me at Luz בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַפְרְךָ֙ <S%H6509><s%> unto me Behold I will make thee fruitful וְהִרְבִּיתִ֔ךָ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> thee and I will make לִקְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> of thee a multitude עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of people וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י <S%H5414><s%> and will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> after thee אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <S%H272><s%> possession עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [for] an everlasting

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> And now thy two בָנֶיךָ֩ <S%H1121><s%> sons הַנּוֹלָדִ֨ים <S%H3205><s%> which were born לְךָ֜ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto thee in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> before בֹּאִ֥י <S%H935><s%> I came אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> unto thee into Egypt לִי־ הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> are mine אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh כִּרְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> [are] mine as Reuben וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> and Simeon יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִֽי׃

וּמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4138><s%> And thy issue אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that הוֹלַ֥דְתָּ <S%H3205><s%> which thou begettest אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> after לְךָ֣ יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> after שֵׁ֧ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> of their brethren יִקָּרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> them shall be thine [and] shall be called בְּנַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> in their inheritance

וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I בְּבֹאִ֣י <S%H935><s%> And as for me when I came מִפַּדָּ֗ן <S%H6307><s%> from Padan מֵ֩תָה֩ <S%H4191><s%> died עָלַ֨י <S%H5921><s%> to my sorrow רָחֵ֜ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> by me in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way בְּע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> when כִּבְרַת־ <S%H3530><s%> yet [there was] but a little אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> way לָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> unto Ephrath וָאֶקְבְּרֶ֤הָ <S%H6912><s%> and I buried her שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> her there בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> there in the way אֶפְרָ֔ת <S%H672><s%> of Ephrath הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> the same [is] Bethlehem

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> beheld יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph's וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father בָּנַ֣י <S%H1121><s%> They [are] my sons הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> hath given לִ֥י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> whom God בָּזֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> here וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> me in this [place] And he said קָֽחֶם־ <S%H3947><s%> Bring them נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about וַאֲבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <S%H1288><s%> I pray thee unto me and I will bless

וְעֵינֵ֤י <S%H5869><s%> Now the eyes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּבְד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> were dim מִזֹּ֔קֶן <S%H2207><s%> for age לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> [so that] he could לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> not see וַיַּגֵּ֤שׁ <S%H5066><s%> And he brought them near אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> unto him and he kissed לָהֶ֖ם וַיְחַבֵּ֥ק <S%H2263><s%> them and embraced לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph רְאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> to see פָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> never פִלָּ֑לְתִּי <S%H6419><s%> I had not thought וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הֶרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> hath shewed אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and lo God גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> well אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> me also thy seed

וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> brought them out יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from between בִּרְכָּ֑יו <S%H1290><s%> his knees וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and he bowed לְאַפָּ֖יו <S%H639><s%> himself with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the earth

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took יוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵיהֶם֒ <S%H8147><s%> them both אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרַ֤יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim בִּֽימִינוֹ֙ <S%H3225><s%> in his right hand מִשְּׂמֹ֣אל <S%H8040><s%> left hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> toward Israel's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh בִשְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <S%H8040><s%> in his left hand מִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> right hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> toward Israel's וַיַּגֵּ֖שׁ <S%H5066><s%> and brought [them] near אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> stretched out יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמִינ֜וֹ <S%H3225><s%> his right hand וַיָּ֨שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> [it] upon Ephraim's וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַצָּעִ֔יר <S%H6810><s%> who [was] the younger וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <S%H8040><s%> and his left hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> upon Manasseh's שִׂכֵּל֙ <S%H7919><s%> wittingly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> although מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> for Manasseh הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> [was] the firstborn

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> And he blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הָֽאֱלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> God אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> did walk אֲבֹתַ֤י <S%H1><s%> whom my fathers לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> the God הָרֹעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> which fed אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> מֵעוֹדִ֖י <S%H5750><s%> me all my life long עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

הַמַּלְאָךְ֩ <S%H4397><s%> The Angel הַגֹּאֵ֨ל <S%H1350><s%> which redeemed אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> me from all evil יְבָרֵךְ֮ <S%H1288><s%> bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִים֒ <S%H5288><s%> the lads וְיִקָּרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> be named בָהֶם֙ שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> and let my name וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> on them and the name אֲבֹתַ֖י <S%H1><s%> of my fathers אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וְיִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac וְיִדְגּ֥וּ <S%H1711><s%> and let them grow לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> into a multitude בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> And when Joseph כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשִׁ֨ית <S%H7896><s%> laid אָבִ֧יו <S%H1><s%> that his father יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יְמִינ֛וֹ <S%H3225><s%> his right עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וַיֵּ֣רַע <S%H7489><s%> displeased בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> affliction וַיִּתְמֹ֣ךְ <S%H8551><s%> him and he held up יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> his father's לְהָסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> to remove אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and רֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> head אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> it from Ephraim's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> unto Manasseh's

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Not כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> Not so my father כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַבְּכֹ֔ר <S%H1060><s%> for this [is] the firstborn שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> put יְמִינְךָ֖ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head

וַיְמָאֵ֣ן <S%H3985><s%> refused אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> And his father וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said יָדַ֤עְתִּֽי <S%H3045><s%> I know בְנִי֙ <S%H1121><s%> [it] my son יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְּעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> [it] he also shall become a people וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִגְדָּ֑ל <S%H1431><s%> and he also shall be great וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> but truly אָחִ֤יו <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> his younger יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> shall be greater מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than וְזַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> than he and his seed יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall become מְלֹֽא־ <S%H4393><s%> shall become a multitude הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of nations

וַיְבָ֨רֲכֵ֜ם <S%H1288><s%> And he blessed בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them that day הַהוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמוֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying בְּךָ֗ יְבָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> bless יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> In thee shall Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְשִֽׂמְךָ֣ <S%H7760><s%> make אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God כְּאֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> thee as Ephraim וְכִמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> and as Manasseh וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> Behold I die וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> but God עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> you וְהֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> shall be with you and bring you again אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of your fathers

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I נָתַ֧תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> Moreover I have given לְךָ֛ שְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7926><s%> portion אַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> to thee one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> more אַחֶ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> above thy brethren אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H3947><s%> which I took מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorite בְּחַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> with my sword וּבְקַשְׁתִּֽי׃ <S%H7198><s%> and with my bow פ
